name: Barb Barrage
description: You launch a countless toxic barbs in all directions. Each creature in range must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 1d6 + MOVE poison damage on a hit and becoming poisoned. If the target is already poisoned, double your MOVE modifier when adding damage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 7d4 at level 17.
